tasks.label: Run test cases (C++,linux)
tasks.command: base="${fileBasenameNoExtension}"; for f in "${base}"*.in; do echo "======= $f ======="; expected="${f%.in}.out"; "./$base" < "$f" > .tmp; cat .tmp; if diff -w -B .tmp "$expected" >/dev/null; then echo -e "\033[32m--- AC ---\033[0m"; else echo -e "\033[31m--- WA ---\033[0m"; fi; cat "$expected"; echo; done;

tasks.label: Run test cases (python, linux)
tasks.command: base="${fileBasenameNoExtension}"; for f in "${base}"*.in; do echo "======= $f ======="; expected="${f%.in}.out";pypy3 "$base.py" < "$f" > .tmp; cat .tmp; if diff -w -B .tmp "$expected" >/dev/null; then echo -e "\033[32m--- AC ---\033[0m"; else echo -e "\033[31m--- WA ---\033[0m"; fi; cat "$expected"; echo; done;
